tool.name: CphstatsRun
tool.description: : Wrapper of the AmberTools (AMBER MD Package) cphstats tool module.

param.name: input_cpin_path
param.label: input CPIN file
param.help: Input constant pH file (AMBER cpin). Format: [input].cpin

param.name: input_cpout_path
param.label: input CPOUT,ZIP,GZIP file
param.help: Output constant pH file (AMBER cpout). Format: [input].[format]

param.name: outname_output_dat_path
param.label: output DAT,OUT,TXT,O name
param.help: Output file to which the standard calcpka-type statistics are written Format: [output].[format]

param.name: outname_output_population_path
param.label: output DAT,OUT,TXT,O name
param.help: Output file where protonation state populations are printed for every state of every residue Format: [output].[format]

param.name: outname_output_chunk_path
param.label: output DAT,OUT,TXT,O name
param.help: Output file where the time series data calculated over chunks of the simulation are printed Format: [output].[format]

param.name: outname_output_cumulative_path
param.label: output DAT,OUT,TXT,O name
param.help: Output file where the cumulative time series data is printed Format: [output].[format]

param.name: outname_output_conditional_path
param.label: output DAT,OUT,TXT,O name
param.help: Output file with requested conditional probabilities Format: [output].[format]

param.name: outname_output_chunk_conditional_path
param.label: output DAT,OUT,TXT,O name
param.help: Output file with a time series of the conditional probabilities over a trajectory split up into chunks Format: [output].[format]

param.name: sele
param.label: Take tool settings:
param.help: Select where tool settings are to be read from

param.name: properties
param.label: Configuration file
param.help: File containing tool settings. See below for the syntax

param.name: jsonstr
param.label: JSON string
param.help: JSON string containing tool settings. See below for the syntax

param.name: timestep
param.label: timestep
param.help: Simulation time step -in ps-, used to print data as a function of time.

param.name: verbose
param.label: verbose
param.help: Controls how much information is printed to the calcpka-style output file. Options are: False - Just print fraction protonated. True - Print everything calcpka prints.

param.name: interval
param.label: interval
param.help: Interval between which to print out time series data like chunks, cumulative data, and running averages. It is also used as the window of the conditional probability time series.

param.name: protonated
param.label: protonated
param.help: Print out protonation fraction instead of deprotonation fraction in time series data.

param.name: pka
param.label: pka
param.help: Print predicted pKas -via Henderson-Hasselbalch equation- in place of fraction -de-protonated.

param.name: calcpka
param.label: calcpka
param.help: Triggers the calcpka-style output.

param.name: running_avg_window
param.label: running_avg_window
param.help: Defines a window size -in MD steps- for a moving, running average time series.

param.name: chunk_window
param.label: chunk_window
param.help: Computes the time series data over a chunk of the simulation of this specified size -window- time steps.

param.name: cumulative
param.label: cumulative
param.help: Computes the cumulative average time series data over the course of the trajectory.

param.name: fix_remd
param.label: fix_remd
param.help: This option will trigger cphstats to reassemble the titration data into pH-specific ensembles. This is an exclusive mode of the program, no other analyses will be done.

param.name: conditional
param.label: conditional
param.help: Evaluates conditional probabilities. CONDITIONAL should be a string of the format: <resid>:<state>,<resid>:<state>,... or <resid>:PROT,<resid>:DEPROT,... or <resid>:<state1>;<state2>,<resid>:PROT,... where <resid> is the residue number in the prmtop and <state> is either the state number or -p-rotonated or -d-eprotonated, case-insensitive.

param.name: binary_path
param.label: binary_path
param.help: Path to the cphstats executable binary.

param.name: output_dat_path_format
param.label: output_dat_path_format
param.help: Format of the output file

param.name: output_population_path_format
param.label: output_population_path_format
param.help: Format of the output file

param.name: output_chunk_path_format
param.label: output_chunk_path_format
param.help: Format of the output file

param.name: output_cumulative_path_format
param.label: output_cumulative_path_format
param.help: Format of the output file

param.name: output_conditional_path_format
param.label: output_conditional_path_format
param.help: Format of the output file

param.name: output_chunk_conditional_path_format
param.label: output_chunk_conditional_path_format
param.help: Format of the output file
